616500.name: Star Realms - Colony Wars
616500.description:
Can you master the latest strategies, and take your place in the annals of galactic history?

Colony Wars is the first standalone set for the award-winning Star Realms Deckbuilding Game. It features all-new Trade Deck cards in the factions you all know and love, and all-new abilities. Star Realms Colony Wars is fully compatible with the Star Realms Core set, or may be played by itself.

This standalone expansion contains 120 new cards (43 unique). Use these cards in online play, versus the AI or a friend, or in the 9th and 10th chapter of the campaign.
616500.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
